summary: AmeriCorps funds grants—over $900 million in FY 2023—for volunteer and national service programs to address a range of community needs across the country. These grants support projects in areas like disaster recovery, educational support, and environmental stewardship. title: Grants: AmeriCorps Should Take Multiple Actions to Better Manage Fraud Risks
